title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Tom Brady returning from retirement and why it makes sense for the 7-time Super Bowl champion to continue his NFL career. He believes one NFL team is sending a clear message based on their rumored interest in trading for another star quarterback. He tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about Tom Brady. Plus, former NFL coach Brian Schottenheimer joins the show to discuss his time working with Russell Wilson in Seattle and what we can expect from Trevor Lawrence next season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
